title: New emotes for Lee Sin, Leona, and Zed

replies.body: But, what happened to the Karthus emote?
The same thing that happened to the emote regular sales I guess.

Zed is so happy Leona and Lee are memeing.

{{champion:89}} : (Deep Breath)
{{champion:64}} : Boi
{{champion:238}} : (HUGE GASP)
Being a {{champion:89}} main, her emote is a must have. Thank you Riot.
